name: World.Save()
description:
In the distant future our planet will be threatened by both aliens and asteroids. Humanity has already been evacuated and is trying to prevent the total destruction of the planet via remote-controlled spaceships. After months of conflict only your spaceship is left. The hope of mankind rests on your abilities...

World.Save() is a science fiction, top down, arcade game, where you have to take care of your own and the life of your planet. Take control over the last spaceship in Earth's orbit and defend the planet from asteroids and alien attacks.

In addition to the normal attacks, special events such as asteroid hail or boss battles provide excitement as the enemies grow stronger and the asteroids become faster. Try to achieve the best possible highscore and compete with your friends!

See you in space!
Cineterra
